featured.text: The Hebrew Bible states that Nehemiah, an official serving King Artaxerxes of ancient Persia, asked permission to travel to Judah.

definition.zh_def: 希伯來語，一種古老的閃米特語言，主要用於以色列及猶太教經典中。
definition.en_def: Hebrew, an ancient Semitic language primarily used in Israel and in Jewish religious texts.
definition.example: She is learning Hebrew to better understand her heritage.
